name: take off (ogelin)
description:
Let us take some heavy thoughts off your mind in this simple game. 

First, write what's bothering you lately (if you wish). 

Then, take deep breaths and imagine your worries floating into space. 

We hope you'll feel much lighter after. 

--

This game is made possible by Pixelles Game Incubator. Thank you to Marie, Emilio, and J, for your precious help.
